dmca.title: Unauthorized Use of the Protected Intellectual Property
dmca.body:
It has come to my attention that your directory has approved the submission of a web site that relates to Vector Marketing Corporation, Cutco Cutlery and its affiliates located at http://www.petitiononline.com/vector/petition.html. 

This web site provides inaccurate and misleading information related to Vector Marketing, Cutco Cutlery or its affiliates and contains unauthorized use of the protected intellectual property associated with these names.  (Reg. #’s 2987128, 2987127, 2455324, 2408342, 2287181, 1854037, and 0547065).
 
This letter serves as a cease and desist notice that you remove the above web site from your directory listings immediately. A failure to remove this site from your directory listings may result in further legal action.

Sincerely,
sam
